level.heading: Enforceability of lease contract.
level.text: Except as otherwise provided in this article, a lease contract is effective and enforceable according to its terms between the parties, against purchasers of the goods and against creditors of the parties.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 9-128
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 9-128, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 28:2A-101.
